column4: I need some help with kernel issues.  My laptop keeps flashing scroll and cap locks
I need help w/ kernel issues
Brassmaster: Give me the command and I'll do it.  Sorry Newbie
and paste the url it gives you
did you recently install drivers or kernel modules?
can you pastebin the output of lspci?
you'll probably need to do sudo apt-get install pastebinit first.
not intentionally,  This problem has been going on since I switch from windows XP to ubuntu
